content.rendered:
Join Rally for Ukraine Near You

People all over the world are coming together in solidarity with Ukraine condemning Putin’s aggression and violent missile attacks on civilians.

Find an event in your country, and join the movement to protest against the Russian invasion of Ukraine. We ask you to stand up for Ukraine and support our country in the struggle for freedom, human rights, and democracy around the world!

We are sure that all protests against the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine are able to add its voice of support to the international call from world leaders and institutions. Oppose the Russian unprovoked invasion and its chosen path of bloodshed and destruction.

Join events near me
